sections.PURPOSE: Bull Troop empowers small unit leaders to deliberately plan, resource, and execute decentralized squad level training nested within quarterly Troop training guidance.
sections.KEY TASKS:
1) Disciplined preparation IAW the 8-step training model.
2) Reference & incorporate most current doctrine for material to be trained.
3) Leaders certify trainees through incorporation of a doctrinal evaluation and record results.
4) Integrate one communications platform from SQDN PACE to report departure, training evaluation results, and return from training site.
5) Backbrief CO/1SG NLT T+6
sections.END STATE: Bull Troop practices disciplined preparation and
sections.TASKS: Phase III (Recovery) Starts with: Ends with: Critical

ALL EMERGENCIES NEED TO GO THROUGH RANGE OPERATIONS
POI to HLZ or AXP (Time 10-20 min)

HH-60s or HN EMS will transport casualties to Amberg, Sulzback or Weiden. -Total time 40 minutes from POI to Role III
-Aircraft/MEV can carry 4 litters or 8 ambulatory patients, or a combination of the types.
